subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Rodgers’s three touchdown passes and Julius Peppers’s interception return for a touchdown lifted Green Bay past Minnesota, 42-10, as the Packers improved their record to 3-2.
snippet: Rodgers’s three touchdown passes and Julius Peppers’s interception return for a touchdown lifted Green Bay past Minnesota, 42-10, as the Packers improved their record to 3-2.
